name: Bloack
description:
Protect the egg at all cost

Use your mouse to move the shield around the egg to avoid bullets from reaching it. Don't let it break!

2.0 Update: Upon reaching score 200 you'll unlock the Ultimate Power! Click when your cursor is shining pink to use it!

// Just a little test project I made for fun. I may update it a little in the future. Hope you like it!
